Name: Lapya
About the game: Single-player story based action shooter in a ruined world where people and robots have retreated to the underground, Lapya has a mission - to keep their sun shining. Many generations have passed since Yellowstone erupted but we still have to live underground where humans live side by side with robots. CREDITS PROGRAMMERS Jani Koivumäki - Camera, controls, audio system Mika Kivennenä - AI, camera Olli Salminen - Questing, AI, dialogue system Oskari Turunen - Code lead, vice project lead , scene loading system, menus GRAPHIC DESIGNERS Henna Takkinen - Character artist, cutscenes, UI design Jonna Lahti - Creature artist, audio design Rosa Parviola - Art lead, project lead, game concept, level design, UI, props Silja Pajunen - Vice art lead, lighting, special effects, post-processing, prop artist, 2D art, level design, trailer SPECIAL THANKS TO Riku Tolvanen - Trailer Soundtrack Team Metroshock consists of game industry students. Both our programmers and artists have been studying for 10 months, while Lapya is a product of 3 months of hard work.
